main event: A white light was observed overhead in flight to the northeast disappearing over the horizon in Denver, Colorado on May 13, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 to 20 minutes,The observer was a 24-year-old civilian medical tech working at Mercy Hospital,The sighting occurred at night from the roof of the hospital,The weather was clear at the time of the sighting,Although ECHO I passed over Colorado about 40 minutes after the sighting, no completed forms were returned for evaluation.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
witness description: 24-year-old civilian, medical tech at Mercy Hospital
